00022 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00023 
00024 GenericFileWriter::GenericFileWriter(FileHeader* p, bool truncate) 
00025 {
00026         fileHdr = p;
00027         OpenFileOStream(fileHdr->GetFilename(), truncate);
00028         CreateWriters();
00029 }
00030 
00031 GenericFileWriter::~GenericFileWriter() 
00032 {
00033         writers.clear();
00034         os.flush();
00035         os.close(); 
00036 }
00037 
00038 int32_t GenericFileWriter::GetFilePos()
00039 {
00040         return os.tellp();
00041 }
00042 
00043 void GenericFileWriter::SeekFromCurrentPos(int32_t offset)
00044 {
00045         os.seekp(offset, std::ios::cur);
00046 }
00047 
00048 void GenericFileWriter::SeekFromBeginPos(int32_t offset)
00049 {
00050         os.seekp(offset, std::ios::beg);
00051 }
00052 
00053 void GenericFileWriter::SeekFromEndPos(int32_t offset)
00054 {
00055         os.seekp(offset, std::ios::end);
00056 }
00057 
00058 void GenericFileWriter::WriteHeader()
00059 {
00060         FileHeaderWriter writer;
00061         writer.Write(os, *fileHdr);
00062         writer.UpdateDataGroupOffset(os, os.tellp());
00063 }
00064 
00065 DataGroupWriter& GenericFileWriter::GetDataGroupWriter(int32_t index)
00066 {
00067         return writers[index];
00068 }
00069 
00070 int32_t GenericFileWriter::GetDataGroupCnt()
00071 {
00072         return (int32_t)writers.size();
00073 }
00074 
00075 void GenericFileWriter::GetDataGroupWriters(DataGroupWriterIt &begin, DataGroupWriterIt &end)
00076 {
00077         begin = writers.begin();
00078         end = writers.end();
00079 }
00080 
00081 void GenericFileWriter::OpenFileOStream(const std::string &file, bool truncate)
00082 {
00083         if(truncate)
00084         {
00085                 os.open(file.c_str(), std::ios::out|std::ios::trunc|std::ios::binary);
00086         }
00087         else
00088         {
00089                 os.open(file.c_str(), std::ios::out|std::ios::binary|std::ios::in);
00090         }
00091         if (!os)
00092         {
00093                 affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::FileCreateException e;
00094                 throw e;
00095         }
00096 }
00097 
00098 void GenericFileWriter::CreateWriters()
00099 {
00100         int sz = fileHdr->GetDataGroupCnt();
00101         for(int i = 0; i < sz; i++)
00102         {
00103                 DataGroupWriter* p = CreateDataGroupWriter(fileHdr->GetDataGroup(i));
00104                 writers.push_back(*p);
00105                 delete p;
00106         }
00107 }
00108 
00109 DataGroupWriter* GenericFileWriter::CreateDataGroupWriter(DataGroupHeader& hdr)
00110 {
00111         return new DataGroupWriter(&os, &hdr);
00112 }
00113 
00114 void GenericFileWriter::Write(u_int32_t p)
00115 {
00116         FileOutput::WriteUInt32(os, p);
00117 }
